lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic intends to come out fighting at next week's ATP World Tour Finals and prove that rumors of his decline have been grossly exaggerated.
snippet: Novak Djokovic intends to come out fighting at next week's ATP World Tour Finals and prove that rumors of his decline have been grossly exaggerated....

headline.main: Djokovic Out to Scotch Rumors of His Decline
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Out to Scotch Rumors of His Decline
